name: Child Labour and Young Workers Policy

fields.label: Policy Statement
fields.description: Outlines the company's commitment to prohibit child labour and regulate employment of young workers in accordance with legal and ethical standards.

fields.label: Child Labour Prohibition
options: No employment under age 15 or minimum schooling age
Proof of age required at hiring

fields.label: Employment of Young Workers
options: Max 35 hours/week, no overtime or night shifts

fields.label: Health and Safety for Young Workers
fields.description: Ensure safe environment and prohibit exposure to harmful or hazardous work conditions.

fields.label: Corrective Action for Violations
options: Immediate removal of child from workplace
Support child with access to education

fields.label: Review and Compliance
fields.description: Policy is reviewed annually and aligned with BCEA, WIETA/SIZA, and legal standards.
